NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 CASSAVA: Daz, I have been trying to access a conversation I wrote back on Brittle Hollow, but this projection stone seems to lack any record of that conversation! Could there be an issue with the data stored on it? 2 1 DAZ: My love, I fear you may have misundersood how projection stones and recorded conversations work! 3 2 DAZ: Conversations shared across projection stones are recorded into the projection walls they are written on, not the projection stones themselves. 4 3 DAZ: A single projection stone only grants access to any conversation with the respective wall; Think of each projection stone as a unique key, and the projection walls as having locks for each key. 5 3 DAZ: To give an example: you could only see this conversation by using a projection stone to the Scroll and Stone Workshop from the Construction Yard's projection wall, or vice versa - and no others! 6 5 CASSAVA: Goodness, that makes so much more sense now! No wonder I could never seem to find my conversations on a different wall than I'd written it on.. Gratitude, my love. Workshop EX3 3
